entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is the one who is trying to keep Barty's illness a secret from Rita Skeeter. He mentions that he has people looking for Bertha Jorkins.

entities.name: barty
entities.description: Barty is the person who is ill and absent from work. Bagman is trying to keep his illness a secret.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who is poking around for information about Barty's illness and Bertha Jorkins.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is a person who went missing. Bagman mentions that Rita Skeeter might say she's gone missing like Bertha Jorkins.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is talking to Bagman about Barty's illness and Bertha Jorkins.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is Barty's assistant. He says that Barty is ill.

relationships.description: Bagman knows about Barty's illness and is trying to keep it a secret.
Bagman has people looking for Bertha Jorkins.
